questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what dominant color characterizes this footwear?

Considering the shape of the toe, how would you describe the toe shape of these sneakers?

Analyzing the texture of the upper material, what is the surface texture of the shoe's main body?

Based on the thickness of the sole, would you classify these as high-sole or low-sole shoes?

Inspecting the sole's edge, is the sole edge straight or does it have a distinct design?
